product.longDescription:
Novaire's refined finish and durable hardside design make it a must have for the sophisticated traveler. This spinner is constructed from 100% Makrolon® material with high impact resistance, a textured shell with a subtle sheen that reduces the visibility of scratches, and 360 degree spinner wheels for quiet and easy maneuverability. Novaire offers a roomy interior with an array of compartment possibilities including multiple zippered pockets and a removable hanging organizer. An elegant minimalist with maximum potential.

  • An exterior mounted pull handle.
  • Fully lined interior featuring multiple organizational pockets and a removable hanging organizer for toiletries and sundries.
  • An integrated 3-digit TSA-approved lock offers additional security.
  • The textured shell reduces the visibility of scratches caused by travel's hard knocks.
  • Four 360 degree spinner wheels provide easy-pivot mobility and glide.
  • Tie down straps to secure your possessions.
  • Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Visit our Carry-On Guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.
product.shortDescription: Novaire's refined finish and durable hardside design make it a must have for the sophisticated traveler. This spinner is constructed from 100% Makrolon® material with high impact resistance, a textured shell with a subtle sheen that reduces the visibility of scratches, and 360 degree spinner wheels for quiet and easy maneuverability. Novaire offers a roomy interior with an array of compartment possibilities including multiple zippered pockets and a removable hanging organizer. An elegant minimalist with maximum potential.
